channel.title: DreamX / 639 / Dicing / Unique / New / Staff Needed
channel.description:
[align=center][img]http://puu.sh/6SixL.png[/img][/align]
Today I will be telling you about the new project 'Dreamx' we have been working on this for over 2 months now and have finally come to the release date. The server is unique and has helping staff. We're here to make runescape private servers enjoyable for you all. Hope to see you ingame. PM ME WHEN YOU LOGIN IF YOU NEED HELP MY IGN IS 'J'
Links
[url=http://Dreamx-rsps.net]Website[/url] [url=https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/16967740/client.rar]Downloadable Client[/url]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/zCPoMco.png[/img]
[b]Features[/b]
24.7 Lag free Great staff Corp Nex All spirit shields Dragon claws spec Dicing Unique home Active players Staff needed! [ no joke ] great eco Shops Training fun Skilling Construction Farming Duel Dung Updates to improve Website Forum Download Webclient gravestones
